869340.name: The Federal Rescue
869340.description:
The Federal Rescue is an action-packed rescue game! With various gameplay difficulties, you can find the challenge that suits you best. The game also features online interactions, including a chat function to communicate with other players.

Story

John lived a normal life in Los Angeles with his father, Mener, who was the head of the federal police. Aspiring to follow in his father’s footsteps, John was on track to take over his father's role. One day, during a special operation, they uncovered evidence incriminating a prominent national politician. Upon learning this, the politician dispatched his men to capture John and Mener. Unfortunately, only John managed to escape, while his father was captured and taken hostage. Now, John must rescue his father.

You’ll be equipped with a rifle, a sniper, and smoke grenades. Play stealthily, using logic to eliminate enemies, or opt for an action-packed approach, facing foes head-on.

Will you succeed?
869340.supported_languages:
英语*, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
*具有完全音频支持的语言
